function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Self-reported behavior studies may not capture the full extent of compliance with social distancing measures","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of compliance levels and factors influencing behavioral change","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive studies that capture a wide range of factors influencing compliance with social distancing measures","Technologies":"Data collection technologies for studying behavior change and compliance","People":"General population, researchers","Owner":"Research organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Reliance on de-identified cell-phone data to assess compliance with social distancing measures","Impact":"Risk of privacy violations and ethical concerns related to surveillance","Mitigation":"Implementing strict privacy regulations, anonymizing data, and obtaining informed consent for data collection","Technologies":"Data anonymization technologies, consent management platforms","People":"General population, data subjects","Owner":"Data custodians, research organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive studies on compliance factors for COVID-19 mitigation measures","Impact":"Limited understanding of the factors shaping compliance with COVID-19 measures","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive studies that consider a wide range of factors influencing compliance with COVID-19 mitigation measures","Technologies":"Behavioral analysis technologies, data collection technologies","People":"General population, researchers","Owner":"Research organizations, government agencies"}]}
